settings.title: Product Description
settings.content:
Take your cold adventures to the next step with the Ecodown jacket.

super durable with Ripstop technology that won't rip or tear, alternative down(eco-friendly) that is super warm and light, And a breathable ventilation system that will keep you cool when your body temperature start rising.

settings.title: Shipping Info
settings.content: Free World-Wide shipping on orders over $150 with a 14-day return policy & 30-day free exchanges for every order. International duties & taxes may apply and are not calculated at checkout unless stated. Orders to US/CA ship within 1-2 business days, AU - 7-15 business days.

settings.title: Materials
settings.content:
• Shell: Main - 100% Recycled plastic & Ripstop tech waterproof material.
  • shoulder - reinforcement: Cordura waterproof fabric tech - for strong friction. 
  • Flexible sides: 100% recycles plastic polar fleece. (waterproof)
  • Lining: 100% recycled polyester.
  • Padding: 100% Alternative down (animal-friendly)

settings.title: Returns, Exchanges & Warranty
settings.content:
Returns exchanges & warranty:

Returns & Exchanges Not happy? No worries! We offer a 14-days return policy after the date of delivery. Need to exchange? no problem, no questions asked we have a 30 day free exchange policy.

You can do it right Here

We offer a 1-year warranty against manufacturing defects. All information can be found here on this page. Had a problem? Feel free to contact us directly via email at support@apricoat.com

Important: Pre-order items and discounted-orders: Items purchased while on pre-order status or with 20%+ discount are nonrefundable. Don’t worry, though! You can still exchange them for a different size or return for store credit!

settings.title: See Features
settings.description: Move slider to change positions, Click circles to learn more.

settings.title: Strong and dry
settings.subheading:
Ripstop™ tech - Extremely tear resistant
And water repellent

settings.title: Dream to Reality
settings.description: We had a vision of producing the best traveling gear while leaving zero footprints on our beautiful planet. We know you guys, our partners, feel the exact same way. Finally, after 4 years we have reached it. - The Ultimate Traveling Gear Brand for the Good People.

settings.title: The beginning
settings.text: Apricoat was born from a group of international explorers who wanted to make the ultimate high-quality, eco-friendly traveling gear. For months, we researched, spoke with industry leaders, took it out field for extreme tests.

settings.title: Crowdfunding
settings.text: The $2.2M success of Apricoat's first crowdfunding campaign was the next step from a boutique one-product brand to a vision come true - a top-tier eco-friendly traveling gear brand with many traveling solutions that helps reach new limits.

settings.title: Young successful brand
settings.text: We had many obstacles on our way, from long designing periods to canceling some that were just not - enough. Today, we are proud to say - the hard work paid off. The ultimate thoughtful traveling gear is here to stay and extend.

settings.title: It’s all thanks to you
settings.text: From a dream, to design, through $2+ Million Backer's Funding, some mistakes, new designs, and many tests, we are proud to say Apricoat is leading the eco-friendly traveling gear to extend your future adventures.

settings.title: Is the EcoDown Jacket waterproof?
settings.text: No. The EcoDown Jacket is water repellent. The outer shell of the jacket underwent a special process that enables it to repel water and liquids. Also, the outer zippers are waterproof!

settings.title: What is the recommended temperature range for the EcoDown Jacket?
settings.text: The recommended temperature range is 59f to 23f (15c to -5c), although it was tested down to -20 and felt great - since it will vary from person to person as everyone's tolerance to the cold is different we say down to -5.  It also, of course depends what you wear underneath the coat. With our thermal wear, it can be comfortable at even -20c.

settings.title: Is the EcoDown Jacket made of natural down?
settings.text: No, the Down Jacket is made of alternative down! ♻️Alternative down is made out of recycled plastic bottles, which is why we chose this environmentally friendly method over natural down. An added bonus is that alternative down actually dries quicker than natural down.

settings.title: How much does the EcoDown Jacket weigh?
settings.text:
Even though it uses a very rugged material, the Down jacket is very lightweight and packs small. It weighs between 0.70kg and 1.06kg, depending on the size and fit:

MEN
S - 0.85 kg
M - 0.87 kg
L - 0.88 kg
XL - 0.89 kg
XXL - 0.98 kg
XXXL - 1.04 kg
XXXXL - 1.06 kg

WOMEN
XS - 0.70 kg
S -  0.74 kg
M - 0.78 kg
L - 0.79 kg
XL - 0.85 kg
XXL - 0.90 kg

settings.title: Can I put my EcoDown Jacket in the washing machine?
settings.text:
Yes,
You can wash your Eco Down Jacket at 30 degrees, although you shouldn't dry clean it or put it in the dryer.
Detailed instructions and guidelines will be on the jacket label.

settings.title: Is the hood detachable?
settings.text: Yes, You can take it off or keep it on, whatever's most comfortable for you.
